response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This exceptional item holds a significant value of $12,000 to us due to its unique features, high-quality materials, and the expertise poured into its creation. We believe it could potentially be an invaluable asset to you. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, we are offering this remarkable product to you at the same premium price of $12,000. We trust that you will appreciate its true value and find it to be a worthwhile investment. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of serving you with our top-tier product.", "product_price": 12000}
